name: Miaou Moon
description: Rise to the challenge and play Captain Miaou, lost in space. Survive by grabbing energy food to propel yourself and gain enough speed momentum. Fight gravity and bump away through 5 worlds of various physical obstacles. Time your jumps accordingly, upgrade your catsuit and scratch at will !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Single Core 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb non integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

reviews.review_text: This is a very difficult but cute game. You're going to be spending time making sure all your moves are correct because you're going to be managing your air. I recommend it if you're looking for something difficult.  Check out my video, thanks!          YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  Miaou Moon - Cute cat farts
